00027 #ifndef _LUSTRE_NODEMAP_H
00028 #define _LUSTRE_NODEMAP_H
00029 
00030 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00031 
00032 #define LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME "nodemap"
00033 
00034 #define LUSTRE_NODEMAP_DEFAULT_ID 0
00035 
00041 enum nodemap_id_type {
00042         NODEMAP_UID,
00043         NODEMAP_GID,
00044 };
00045 
00046 enum nodemap_tree_type {
00047         NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT,
00048         NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS,
00049 };
00050 
00051 struct nodemap_pde {
00052         char                     npe_name[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
00053         struct proc_dir_entry   *npe_proc_entry;
00054         struct list_head         npe_list_member;
00055 };
00056 
00062 struct lu_nodemap {
00063         /* human readable ID */
00064         char                     nm_name[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
00065         /* flags to govern nodemap behavior */
00066         bool                     nmf_trust_client_ids:1,
00067                                  nmf_allow_root_access:1;
00068         /* unique ID set by MGS */
00069         unsigned int             nm_id;
00070         /* nodemap ref counter */
00071         atomic_t                 nm_refcount;
00072         /* UID to squash unmapped UIDs */
00073         uid_t                    nm_squash_uid;
00074         /* GID to squash unmapped GIDs */
00075         gid_t                    nm_squash_gid;
00076         /* NID range list */
00077         struct list_head         nm_ranges;
00078         /* lock for idmap red/black trees */
00079         rwlock_t                 nm_idmap_lock;
00080         /* UID map keyed by local UID */
00081         struct rb_root           nm_fs_to_client_uidmap;
00082         /* UID map keyed by remote UID */
00083         struct rb_root           nm_client_to_fs_uidmap;
00084         /* GID map keyed by local UID */
00085         struct rb_root           nm_fs_to_client_gidmap;
00086         /* GID map keyed by remote UID */
00087         struct rb_root           nm_client_to_fs_gidmap;
00088         /* attached client members of this nodemap */
00089         struct mutex             nm_member_list_lock;
00090         struct list_head         nm_member_list;
00091         /* access by nodemap name */
00092         struct hlist_node        nm_hash;
00093         struct nodemap_pde      *nm_pde_data;
00094 
00095         /* used when loading/unloading nodemaps */
00096         struct list_head         nm_list;
00097 };
00098 
00099 /* Store handles to local MGC storage to save config locally. In future
00100  * versions of nodemap, mgc will receive the config directly and so this might
00101  * not be needed.
00102  */
00103 struct nm_config_file {
00104         struct dt_object        *ncf_obj;
00105         struct list_head        ncf_list;
00106 };
00107 
00108 void nodemap_activate(const bool value);
00109 int nodemap_add(const char *nodemap_name);
00110 int nodemap_del(const char *nodemap_name);
00111 int nodemap_add_member(lnet_nid_t nid, struct obd_export *exp);
00112 void nodemap_del_member(struct obd_export *exp);
00113 int nodemap_parse_range(const char *range_string, lnet_nid_t range[2]);
00114 int nodemap_parse_idmap(char *idmap_string, __u32 idmap[2]);
00115 int nodemap_add_range(const char *name, const lnet_nid_t nid[2]);
00116 int nodemap_del_range(const char *name, const lnet_nid_t nid[2]);
00117 int nodemap_set_allow_root(const char *name, bool allow_root);
00118 int nodemap_set_trust_client_ids(const char *name, bool trust_client_ids);
00119 int nodemap_set_squash_uid(const char *name, uid_t uid);
00120 int nodemap_set_squash_gid(const char *name, gid_t gid);
00121 bool nodemap_can_setquota(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap);
00122 int nodemap_add_idmap(const char *name, enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00123                       const __u32 map[2]);
00124 int nodemap_del_idmap(const char *name, enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00125                       const __u32 map[2]);
00126 __u32 nodemap_map_id(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00127                      enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00128                      enum nodemap_tree_type tree_type, __u32 id);
00129 ssize_t nodemap_map_acl(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap, void *buf, size_t size,
00130                         enum nodemap_tree_type tree_type);
00131 void nodemap_test_nid(lnet_nid_t nid, char *name_buf, size_t name_len);
00132 __u32 nodemap_test_id(lnet_nid_t nid, enum nodemap_id_type idtype,
00133                       __u32 client_id);
00134 struct nm_config_file *nm_config_file_register(const struct lu_env *env,
00135                                                struct dt_object *obj);
00136 void nm_config_file_deregister(const struct lu_env *env,
00137                                struct nm_config_file *ncf);
